title: E223 Rip Van Haltren for Trade
author: bandrus1

posts.post_title: E223 Rip Van Haltren for Trade
posts.post_content:
Newly Graded arriving for SGC Monday. Extremely rare set, I  believe this presents better than the other 1.5 graded.

I'd be really happy to land a old judge hof.. another 19th century HOF that's interesting or other pre war,
